trunk_position.title: Trunk Position
trunk_position.info: Is the line of your spine parallel to the line of your shins?

tibial_progression_angle.title: Tibial Progression Angle
tibial_progression_angle.info: How much do your knees pass in front of the foot?

foot_position.title: Foot Position
foot_position.info: Are your feet on the ground?

depth.title: Depth
depth.info: Are you hitting appropriate depth (ie. are your thighs at least parallel with the ground)?

hip_position.title: Hip Position
hip_position.info: Are your hips parallel to the ground (ie. no bias to the left or right)?
